title: Rejected Segments: Worst Suggestion Ever! + Lunchbox In A Big Fight With His Wife + Easy Trivia!
itunes:title: Rejected Segments: Worst Suggestion Ever! + Lunchbox In A Big Fight With His Wife + Easy Trivia!
description:
Bobby says he received the worst segment idea in show history so he features it on “Rejected Segments!”. Lunchbox tells us why he is in a fight with his wife…she signed him up for something without his permission. Plus, we get into a heated round of Easy Trivia as Eddie tries to win a prize for a caller!

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
